author: ebouvier
body: This is the PR going with JIRA ticket CMSHLT-193 (https://its.cern.ch/jira/loginCern.jsp?permissionViolation=true&os_destination=%2Fbrowse%2FCMSHLT-193). Single lepton + jets paths are modified in the DQM and validation codes for the Top PAG.
title: Update on Top single lepton + jets paths
